1.title: Pilot

episode of.title: Lunch Break Sort of a Love Story (TV Mini-Series 2018)

1.plot: Jason meets Blythe for the first time.

imdb.plot outline: Sometimes we finally catch a break and fall in love. In this deadpan dramedy, follow polar opposites Jason and Blythe, as they exchange dry wit and sarcastic jabs all while getting to know each other during their lunch breaks. Jason, a shy gentlemen but with quick wit, hangs behind the mall to clear his head from his dull job. But his usual quiet lunch spot is interrupted by Blythe, the spunky firecracker with sarcasm as her second language. With each passing day, their differences seem to subside and their once awkward banter blossoms into a tight friendship. Or maybe something more than that. Tune into 'Lunch Break' to find out.
imdb.title: Lunch Break Sort of a Love Story
akas: Lunch Break Sort of a Love Story (United States)
plot: A social outcast and a sarcastic firecracker find themselves falling for each other during their lunch break.::Jean-Pierre Chapoteau

Sometimes we finally catch a break and fall in love. In this deadpan dramedy, follow polar opposites Jason and Blythe, as they exchange dry wit and sarcastic jabs all while getting to know each other during their lunch breaks. Jason, a shy gentlemen but with quick wit, hangs behind the mall to clear his head from his dull job. But his usual quiet lunch spot is interrupted by Blythe, the spunky firecracker with sarcasm as her second language. With each passing day, their differences seem to subside and their once awkward banter blossoms into a tight friendship. Or maybe something more than that. Tune into 'Lunch Break' to find out.::DayJream Studios
